titleStmt.title: Vindiciæ Carolinæ. Being a true relation of His Highnesse the Prince of Wales, His voyage at sea, since he parted from Calais in France, July 20. untill this very day, 1648.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 23th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
